articles.author: Robert Ramsey
articles.title: Forspoken Gets an 18 Rating in Europe, Suggests Release Date Will Stick - Push Square
articles.content: Forspoken just got an age rating here in Europe from PEGI (that's the region's ratings board, for those who might not know). It's an 18, which is equivalent to 'Mature' in the US. PEGI's description … [+973 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: South Africa: No need for mass monkeypox immunisation – experts - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The African continent has not recently recorded any confirmed or suspected cases of monkeypox, unlike Europe and the US.
articles.content:
South African disease experts have said that they did not see a need for a mass vaccination campaign against monkeypox or believe that cases would explode in the same way as COVID-19.
The African co… [+1165 chars]

articles.title: British Government Approves Abramovich's $5.3 Billion Sale Of Chelsea Soccer Club - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: The British government has granted a license allowing the $5.33 billion sale of the Chelsea soccer club by the sanctioned Russian oligarch Roman Abramovich to a U.S. investment group.

articles.author: Mike Bedigan
articles.title: Bruce Springsteen and the E Street Band announce 2023 Dublin concert dates - Independent.ie
articles.description: Bruce Springsteen and the E Street Band are coming to Ireland in 2023 as part of a string of European tour dates, their first live shows for six years.
articles.content:
Bruce Springsteen and the E Street Band are coming to Ireland in 2023 as part of a string of European tour dates, their first live shows for six years.
